# E-Sport Tournament Management Platform

## Project Overview
Complete Next.js 14+ TypeScript application for managing e-sport tournaments with Discord OAuth authentication, staff dashboard, player registration, and automated bracket generation.

## Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Prisma ORM (SQLite default, PostgreSQL optional)
- NextAuth.js (Discord OAuth)
- Tailwind CSS
- Discord Bot Integration for staff verification

## Key Features
- Discord OAuth authentication
- Role-based access (Player, Staff, Admin)
- Tournament creation and management (Staff only)
- Team registration with approval workflow
- Automated bracket generation (single elimination)
- Match scheduling and score management
- Pick & ban system for competitive games
- Staff action logging
